STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: La créature équipée a la vigilance.
La criatura equipada tiene la habilidad de vigilancia.
装備しているクリーチャーは警戒を持つ。
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then parent:GetCurrentCharacteristics():Characteristic_Set( CHARACTERISTIC_VIGILANCE, 1 ) end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on equipped creature if it’s white.
Au début de votre entretien, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur la créature équipée si elle est blanche.
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre la criatura equipada si es blanca.
Lege zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments eine +1/+1-Marke auf die ausgerüstete Kreatur, falls sie weiß ist.
All’inizio del tuo mantenimento, metti un segnalino +1/+1 sulla creatura equipaggiata se è bianca.
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、装備しているクリーチャーが白ならばその上に+1/+1カウンターを１個置く。
당신의 유지단 시작에, 만약 장착된 생물이 백색이라면 그 생물에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다.
В начале вашего шага поддержки положите один жетон +1/+1 на снаряженное существо, если оно белое.
No início de sua manutenção, coloque um marcador +1/+1 sobre a criatura equipada que seja branca.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TRIGGER: return ( EffectController():MyTurn() ~= 0 ) and ( MTG():GetStep() == STEP_UPKEEP ) and ( Object():GetParent() ~= nil ) and ( Object():GetParent():Test( COLOUR_WHITE ) ~= 0 )
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil then if parent:GetColour():Test( COLOUR_WHITE ) ~= 0 then parent:AddCounters( MTG():PlusOnePlusOneCounters(), 1 ) end end

ACTIVATED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetController( EffectController() ) -- AI 'cannot reequip' exemption local parent = Object():GetParent() if parent ~= nil and EffectController():IsAI() ~= 0 then filter:SetCardInstance(parent) filter:AddExtra(FILTER_EXTRA_FLIP_CARD_INSTANCE) end
ACTIVATED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target_card = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_CardPtr(0) if (target_card ~= nil and EffectSource() ~= nil) then EffectSource():Attach( target_card ) end
